overview:
For over 10 years Joe has served the search marketing community. In 2000, Joe held an executive position at iCrossing for 3-years (the largest Search agency in the US). He was instrumental in planning the company’s long term direction, and was responsible for bringing over 20 of the Fortune 1000 to the iCrossing client base.

He also co-founded and served as President of the Search Agency division of Web.com (Web.com acquired Joe’s company in 2007). Joe has hired and managed over 100 SEO experts in the Phoenix-area.

Joe writes quartlery for Search Marketing Standard and is a featured writer for Visibility Magazine and other online publications including Search Concepts, Search Engine Journal and Web Pro News.
